title: Henry
description: Enthusiasts of open-source and no-code tools, a professional UI/UX designer with 17 years of industry experience. Leading innovation in design systems and user-centered solutions.

title: Addison
description: Expert in motion design and branding. Addison brings a decade of experience transforming digital identities through creative storytelling.

title: David Kim
description: David is a full-stack developer and startup advisor. Known for rapid prototyping and building scalable SaaS platforms.

title: John Carter
description: Specialist in business development and digital marketing. John helps brands scale with a performance-first approach.

title: Emily
description: Emily is a creative technologist, blending art and code to create immersive experiences across web and mobile.

title: Thompson
description: Thompson is a data visualization expert and analytics engineer who tells stories through numbers and interactive charts.
